CustomField.formula: DATE( year(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c)) + floor((month(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c)) + 10)/12) + if(and(month(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c))=12,10>=12),-1,0) , if( mod( month(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c)) + 10 , 12 ) = 0, 12 , mod( month(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c)) + 10 , 12 )) , CASE(if( mod( month(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c)) + 10 , 12 ) = 0, 12 , mod( month(DATEVALUE(Downtime_End_Date__c)) + 10 , 12 )), 9,30, 4,30, 6,30, 11,30, 2,28, 31 ) )
CustomField.label: Downtime InActive Date
